Parry.help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee attacks for a short while.
Parry.targetHelp: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee attacks for a short while.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Flaming_Arrow.help: You fire a Flaming Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn.

Tactics.help: While this power is active, your Accuracy and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes.
Tactics.targetHelp: Your Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception.
Tactics.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Fortitude.help: Luddite Friars can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
